problemsection.part1body: Despite understanding some English, speaking clearly in daily life or at work can still feel stressful or uncertain.
problemsection.part2body: With busy working hours and changing schedules, finding time to attend classes or stay consistent with learning can be difficult.
problemsection.part3body: Many learning tools focus on exams or formal English, making it hard to apply what’s learned to real conversations and everyday situations.
problemsection.subtitle: THE CHALLENGE
problemsection.title: Learning English takes time and support.

aboutUs.headerDescription: We're passionate about making English learning accessible and effective for everyone. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to create innovative solutions that empower migrant workers.

contactUs.headerDescription: We value your feedback and inquiries. Feel free to reach out to us using the form below, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

faq.a1: The LINK Project supports English learning for migrant workers in Singapore...
faq.q2: When will the LINK Project launch?
faq.a2: The core features will be launched in August 2025.
faq.q3: How can I contribute towards the LINK Project?
faq.a3: You can share your ideas on the Google form...
faq.q4: Will the LINK Project be free?
faq.a4: Yes, the LINK Project is completely free and no payment will be required.
faq.q5: What kind of support does the LINK Project provide?
faq.a5: The LINK Project gives you a free AI voice assistant...
